name: Clockwork Leech
description: The Clockwork Leech is a medium-sized construct with mechanical precision, featuring a solid armored frame and stealthy capabilities.
memorable: Its ability to attach and drain hit points quietly makes it a unique threat in encounters.
goals: Typically seeks to ambush creatures and drain their health.
relations: May work alongside other constructs or mechanical creatures.
environment: Often found in laboratories, factories, or other places where constructs are created.
strengths: Immunity to poison and psychic damage, along with resistance to many status ailments.
weaknesses: Poor intelligence and social skills, making it unable to strategize effectively.
attacks: Bite attack that inflicts piercing damage and drains hit points, along with a tail attack for additional damage.
most_powerful_ability: Anesthetizing Bite, which quietly attaches to a target and drains their health each turn.
skills: Excels in stealth with a +3 modifier, and has a +2 modifier in perception.
additional_information: Immunities to being charmed, exhausted, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, and poisoned.
Magic Resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Can detach itself after draining a total of 10 hit points from its host.
test_queries: stealthy leech attacking from the shadows
construct that can attach and suck blood
